name: Phreaker
description:
Phreaker is a virtual reality grappling hook game set in a
large-scale cyberpunk space. More levels are in development, along with gigantic enemies, alternate traversal methods, and a "combat" system. The goal is to ultimately target the Oculus Quest 2, along with all other wired VR platforms. Currently the game can only be played in wired VR form (on Oculus Quest 2, this means using Oculus Link).

The game is under active development and currently has one large level. It's fun.

Art, design, programming, music by Michael Overton Brown.

Trailer music: DJ Stingray - Serotonin.
